revised_title: Dynamics of Spinning Detonation Waves: A Study of Acoustic Phenomena and Fluid Dynamics
tldr: This article examines the dynamics of spinning detonation waves, focusing on the fluid motion of chemically reacting gases and the role of acoustic waves in the process. The author explores the instability of reacting gases with respect to wave motion and the development of transverse shocks from large amplitude acoustic waves in the reaction zone. The findings provide an explanation for the transverse acoustic waves and the spin phenomenon in detonation waves.
